snippet: The attack, one of the deadliest against government soldiers in recent months, came as an offensive against rebels continued on three fronts.
abstract: At least 31 Syrian troops, including four senior officers, are killed in bombing that collapses building on government military base north of Damascus; attack is one of deadliest against government soldiers in several months.
lead_paragraph: The attack, one of the deadliest against government soldiers in recent months, came as an offensive against rebels continued on three fronts.

headline.main: Bomb at Base Kills at Least 31 Syrian Troops
headline.print_headline: Bomb at Base Kills at Least 31 Syrian Troops

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
